ValidationRule.description: Campaign Code 9 digits must start with, - D for Exclusive Campaign - S for Research Campaign - M for Mass Campaign
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign'), IF(TEXT(RTL_Campaign_Type__c) <> 'Local Exclusive', LEFT(RTL_Campaign_Code_9_digits__c,1) <> CASE(TEXT(RTL_Campaign_Type__c), 'Exclusive', 'D', 'Research', 'S', 'Mass','M','' ), FALSE)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign Code must start with D for Exclusive, M for Mass, S for Research.
